name: RemindCustomerInvoicePayment
description:
Remind customers of unpaid invoices by email.

Use this tool to notify customers about unpaid invoices through email. It works for invoices that are open or overdue.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization. It specifies which organization's invoice reminders to manage.

parameters.name: invoice_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the invoice to send a payment reminder for.

parameters.name: email_attachments
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of file URLs to attach to the reminder email.

value_schema.description: Files to be attached to the email

parameters.name: email_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing email details such as recipients, CCs, subject, body, and whether to send from the organization's email.

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

parameters.name: include_customer_statement_pdf
parameters.description: Set to true to include a customer statement PDF with the email reminder.

value_schema.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: send_customer_statement
parameters.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

value_schema.description: Send customer statement pdf a with email.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: Files to be attached to the email

value_schema.description: Files to be attached to the email

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
